vlive.korean: 근데 왜 갑자기 과소비야? Why do you spend money so much today? 듣기 View video tvN D : 내신등급이 내 인생의 등급일까? [언어의 온도 : 우리의 열아홉] Ep.1
vlive.english: Why do you spend money so much today?

vlive.korean: 맞아요, 그건 과소비예요. Right. That'd be excessive. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 용콩별콩의 눕방 아닌 앉방
근데 인정하기는 하지만 너무 과소비였어요. Though I admit it, it was too excessive. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] ASTRO X Rooftop Live - 아스트로의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: Though I admit it, it was too excessive.

vlive.korean: [무한 불신] - 못 믿어. - 너무 과소비하는 거 아니야? [No trust] - He doesn't trust him. - Don't you think you're being a bit excessive? 듣기 View video Amigo TV : 본격 아이돌 혜자방송 <아이돌에 미치고, 아미고TV> 빅스편 (3/7)
vlive.english: [No trust] - He doesn't trust him. - Don't you think you're being a bit excessive?

vlive.korean: 그러면 너무 과소비하게 되지 않나요? -괜찮아요. 법인카드니까요. Isn't it excessive spending? - It's OK. It's the company credit card. 듣기 View video GAVYNJ : 가비의 화려한 외출~☆
vlive.english: Isn't it excessive spending? - It's OK. It's the company credit card.

examples.korean: She has yet to give up the habit of overspending. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 아직도 과소비하는 습성을 버리지 못했다 Neungyule
examples.english: She has yet to give up the habit of overspending. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Reckless spending is being a drag on the economy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 무분별한 과소비 풍조가 경제의 발목을 잡고 있다 Neungyule
examples.english: Reckless spending is being a drag on the economy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Overconsumption is increasing rapidly with saving mentality relaxed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 절약 정신이 느슨해지면서 과소비가 급격히 늘고 있다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Overconsumption is increasing rapidly with saving mentality relaxed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Naysayers, on the other hand, say that higher denominations may hurt the economy by promoting excessive spending. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 반대론자들은 고가의 액면 화폐가 과소비를 촉진함으로써 경제에 해가 될 수도 있다고 말한다. Neungyule
examples.english: Naysayers, on the other hand, say that higher denominations may hurt the economy by promoting excessive spending. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The press is criticizing some members of the wealthy class for overconsumption. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 언론은 일부 부유층의 과소비를 지탄하고 나섰다 Neungyule
examples.english: The press is criticizing some members of the wealthy class for overconsumption. Add to Wordbook
